attributes.action: Lower the  £38700 for UK Family Visas.
attributes.additional_details: I think 18600 should be the same for first 2.5 years  but once the spouse is in uk they  both should earn cominly earn.£38700 but single parent with kids or for a single person 38700 is to much .
attributes.background: Please lower the £38700 threshold  for uk family visa. This should be more realistic  the wages have not increased that much  but putting this limit it would be very difficult  for famlies who are already stugling .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
